ygData.subject: Re: Inn Key's & Backpack makeing
ygData.msgSnippet: hmmm... the keys sound like a hint to something that wasn t added.... guild houses? i also witnessed a GM buying a sewing kit for backpacks but i forgot what
ygData.messageBody:
hmmm... the keys sound like a hint to something that wasn't added.... guild
houses?

i also witnessed a GM buying a sewing kit for backpacks but i forgot what
the sewing kit was called and the pelt to use.... sorry

-----Original Message-----
From: Bryan Pray <bryan@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 11:25 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Inn Key's & Backpack makeing


>From: Bryan Pray <bryan@...>
>
>In the Inn in Felewithe the inn keeper sells keys. I forget what they cost
>but in addition to the purchase cost there is a 1 copper per month fee on
>it. Does any one know what these keys are for? I bought one to try and when
>I tried to sell it back the Inn Keeper told me " I don't want your house
>keys!"
>Also does anyone know what size sewing kit and what kind of pelt or hide
>are required to make a backpack?
>thanks for the help
>
>Albryno
>High Elf Wizard
